bugs.summary: File / Color input popup silently doesn't show up if called after an async call due to the popup blocker.

Permanent /selection/textcontrols/selectionchange.tentative.html | Modifying selectionStart value of the textarea element - assert_equals: expected 1 but got 0 when Gecko 85 merges to Beta on 2020-12-14
Rich text editing: Braille is not tracking text and the cursor when composing documents in contentEditables, with and without ARIA roles.
Firefox very slow on Reddit with VoiceOver and Braille enabled
In contentEditables, list items are not exposed, and the whole text cannot be navigated by character with VoiceOver.
Ship WebRender to missing Skylake gt4 GPU
Report WebRender Software explicitly as a compositor type
Change BlockReflowInput's skipsides setup to be sane.
We report wrong overflow areas for fragmented table-row-groups
Inside a WebWorker context, calling performance.addEventListener throws a generic NS_ERROR_FAILURE
Crashes in NitroPDF creator and reader, e.g. in [@ nitropdfdrivercreator11.dll | nitroui11.dll | DocumentPropertySheets]
Tab does not exit search mode after a location change if it is switched away from quickly
The local search shortcut rows in the preferences UI should show their restriction characters as keywords
Non-editable elements with onpaste handlers should get a "Paste" command in their context menu
Ensure we persist search engine metadata between locale changes
Remove visited-status-resolution notification, or make it test-only.
Remove Places migrations older than Firefox 60
